rules.description: Escape to tmux visual mode (Ctrl+A [) when pressed alone
Change caps_lock to control. if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Right Alt as one-shot Hyper key (OSM)
Hyper OSM: Apply hyper modifiers to keys
Number keys to Function keys (1-2: brightness, 3: F20, 4-6: volume, 7-9: media)
Fn key to Caps Lock when tapped, fn when held
